mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Advises Short that he has been nominated for the position of ambassador to the Netherlands, but that a group in the Senate is holding up Gouverneur Morris' nomination to the same post in France, and thus Short's approval is delayed as well; includes note dated 10 January 1792 informing Short that action still has not been taken by the Senate.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Morris, Gouverneur, 1752-1816
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1792 January 3, [Philadelphia, Pennsylvania] to [William Short], n.p.
